pr_title: [NETBEANS-4755] - remove use of deprecated API - getURL()

timeline.bodyText: could you please merge the new lines 75 + 76? The null assignement is unecessary.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText: Looks still the same - could you please check whether the commit really made it? I'm looking at the changes from the github UI and lines 75+76 are still separate.
replies.author: matthiasblaesing

timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

timeline.bodyText: Is it intentional, that the InvocationTargetException was not removed? This is in contrast to new line 238.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText:
Yes, it was intentional.. This would involve a public method change. And while I would like to do it, I didn't think it would get approved with that change.
I'm happy to do it and learn how to make changes like this, but I need a little bit of guidance how to do this.
replies.author: BradWalker

timeline.bodyText: Is it intentional, that the InvocationTargetException was not removed? This is in contrast to new line 238.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

timeline.bodyText: Is this catch still necessary? At lease I would reduce it to RuntimeException or is thee another checked exception that could be thrown?
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing
matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText: Seems to have lost some where (see other comments)
replies.author: matthiasblaesing

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4755] - remove use of deprecated API - getURL()

Remove the use of a deprecated API, getURL()..

   [repeat] /home/bwalker/src/netbeans/platform/openide.loaders/src/org/openide/loaders/XMLDataObject.java:528: warning: [deprecation] getURL() in FileObject has been deprecated
   [repeat]         String loc = getPrimaryFile().getURL().toExternalForm();
   [repeat]                                      ^

In addition, this deprecated API never throws an exception. So once the change was made, also
had to removed references to the unused exception.
